communitools.title: Communitools
communitools.cardContent: A platform where users can signup, list tools they own and are willing to lend, and see what their neighbours have to offer. It uses a self reported location to determine which neighbours are nearby.
modalContent: Inspired by borrowing infrequently used tools from my neighbours, I decided to develop a platform where users can together create a neighbourhood tool library. Depending on what a constitutes 'nearby' to a user, they will see all of the tools their neighbours have and are willing to lend out.
Built with: Rails, PostgreSQL, Devise, and Bootstrap

whereAreWe.title: Where Are We?
whereAreWe.cardContent: Web-based map game where you have to guess the city/location from topological features like roads, rivers, shorelines, releif, etc. Currently in the brainstorming phase, researching the project's feasibility.

allRelated.title: All Related
allRelated.cardContent: Interactive photo album to display my wildlife photography and allow users to see how different species are more or less related to each other.

personalWebsite.title: Personal Website
personalWebsite.cardContent: Simple website to showcase my work. Also an ongoing project I will use to improve my UI/UX design and try out different CSS frameworks.
modalContent: This website! It serves to showcase my experience and my past, current, and future projects.
Built with: Github Pages and Bulma
